title: Hoods Up
lyrics:
Yeah
Excision
Dion
Get your hoods up
Wait through the darkness, shift like a shadow

Roped-up mantle, ready any battle

Cloaked, we invisible, thiefs in the night

And our minds are invincible, ready for the fight

Creep through the darkness, shift like a shadow

Roped-up mantle, ready any battle

Cloaked, we invisible, thiefs in the night

And our minds are invincible

Get your hood up



Get your hood-



Get your hood-

(Bring that back)

(Bring that back)

(Hey) Get your hood up



Get your hood-



Creep through the darkness, shift like a shadow

Roped-up mantle, ready any battle

Cloaked, we invisible, thiefs in the night

And our minds are invincible, ready for the fight

Cloaked, we invisible, thiefs in the night

Get your hood up
